charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is placed on probation for a term of THREE (3) YEARS; Special Assessment $100.00, to be paid in full by 3/15/2015

21:846 Conspiracy to Possess with Intent to Distribute Marijuana(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant placed on probation for a term of FOUR (4) YEARS; Special Assessment $100.00, to be paid in full by 3/15/2015; 6/9/2016 REVOKING PROBATION; Defendant is committed to the Bureau of Prisons for a term of FIVE (5) MONTHS, with a term of THREE (3) YEARS supervised release to follow; REVOKED 2/12/2018 defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of TEN (10) MONTHS, with credit for time served, with no term of supervised release to follow
